snippet: Just days before the government could default on some of its obligations, the credit rating agency Fitch has put the United States on a “negative ratings watch.”
abstract: Just days before the government could default on some of its obligations, the credit rating agency Fitch has put the United States on a “negative ratings watch.”

headline.main: Credit Agency Places U.S. on ‘Ratings Watch’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
